content: that your tail is long enough to attach the piece to the ragdoll is to run the yarn close to the edge of the piece and cut the yarn 2 ½ times the length  chain stitches and slip stitches do not count as a stitch unless otherwise indicated  stitch counts are at the end of each round/row bold and in parentheses  when joining new yarn other than for a colour change use a slip_stitch  with my patterns i usually always start with an increase in the 1st stitch so if your increase stitch falls in the 1st stitch of the increase stitch from the last round your stitch count should be
